title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 36.10 - Official certification that record of birth is not on file required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 36.10 - Official certification that record of birth is not on file required

State Regulations

Each application for the delayed registration on an unrecorded birth shall be accompanied by a statement issued either by the local registrar of the community where the birth is believed to have occurred or by the State Department of Health to the effect that a search of the records has been made and that no record bearing the name of the person whose birth is to be recorded was found. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
